account_sid.description: The unique SID identifier of the Account. Pattern: ^AC[0-9a-fA-F]{32}$

call_sid.description: The unique SID identifier of the Call. Pattern: ^CA[0-9a-fA-F]{32}$

call_type.description: The Call Type of the summarized Call.

call_state.description: The Call State of the summarized Call.

answered_by.description: The Answered By value based on Answering Machine Detection (AMD).

processing_state.description: The Processing State of the Call Summary ('partial' or 'complete').

created_time.description: The time the Call was created in ISO 8601 format.

start_time.description: The time the Call was started in ISO 8601 format.

end_time.description: The time the Call was ended in ISO 8601 format.

duration.description: Duration between call initiation and end.

connect_duration.description: Duration between call answer and end.

from.description: The calling party. (Structure not fully detailed in available information, assume flexible object)

to.description: The called party. (Structure not fully detailed in available information, assume flexible object)

carrier_edge.description: Contains metrics and properties for the Twilio media gateway of a PSTN call. (Summarized object, specific details not provided for summary)

client_edge.description: Contains metrics and properties for the Twilio media gateway of a Client call. (Summarized object, specific details not provided for summary)

sdk_edge.description: Contains metrics and properties for the SDK sensor library for Client calls. (Summarized object, specific details not provided for summary)

sip_edge.description: Contains metrics and properties for the Twilio media gateway of a SIP Interface or Trunking call. (Summarized object, specific details not provided for summary)

tags.description: Tags applied to calls by Voice Insights analysis indicating potential subjective degradation of call quality.

attributes.description: Attributes capturing call-flow-specific details. (Structure not fully detailed in available information)

properties.description: Contains edge-agnostic call-level details. (Structure not fully detailed in available information)

trust.description: Contains trusted communications details including Branded Call and verified caller ID.

annotation.description: Programmatically labeled annotations for the Call.
